5817645b3627bfe3d3eaee2dc8e644967d38f7a73716907dbc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d2cf5fd068045422dc3ec6c8855f0c3bc38748fbc9be8ad32ef770c3de23e39a","dweb:/ipfs/QmNiUfwsYnB9B7yx3TwYzrgJCTgUVEuUpiCvzBL8bF92cw"]}},"version":1}

approveFundReleaseManager(address).details: Approve the FundReleaseManager to spend USDT

params._fundReleaseManager: Address of the FundReleaseManager contract Called by owner when setting up the FundReleaseManager

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the contract with required dependencies

params._campaignManager: Address of the Campaign Manager contract
params._minDonationAmount: Minimum donation amount in USDT units
params._usdtToken: Address of the USDT token contract

params._amount: Amount of USDT to donate Donors call this to contribute to campaigns
params._campaignId: ID of the campaign to donate to

getCampaignDonationTotal(uint256).details: Get the total amount donated to a campaign

getCampaignDonors(uint256).details: Get the list of donors for a campaign

getContractBalance().details: Get the USDT balance held by this contract

getDonationAmount(address,uint256).details: Get the donation amount from a specific donor to a campaign

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Pause the contract Only owner can pause the contract

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

recoverToken(address,uint256).details: Emergency function to recover tokens sent by mistake

params._amount: Amount to recover Only owner can recover tokens
params._token: Address of the token to recover

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._minDonationAmount: New minimum donation amount Only owner can change the minimum donation amount

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Unpause the contract Only owner can unpause the contract
